member.name: M:NetCore3WebAPI.Controllers.TestController.GetBestQuestions
member.summary: This Gets Best Questions - this API method will return the 5 top score questions.

member.name: M:NetCore3WebAPI.Controllers.TestController.GetBestAnswer(System.Int32)
member.summary: This Gets Best Answer (int questionId) – this method will get a question id as parameter and return its 5 accepted and top score answers.

member.name: M:NetCore3WebAPI.Controllers.TestController.GetOwner(System.Int32)
member.summary: This Gets Owner (int answerId) – this method will get an answer id and return the owner information that the answer provides and more(location, user type, creation date, etc...)
